text: The Eiffel Tower is located in Paris.
The Great Wall of China is visible from space.
The Mona Lisa is a famous painting by Leonardo da Vinci.
The Statue of Liberty is a symbol of freedom.
The Colosseum is an ancient amphitheater in Rome.
The Taj Mahal is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
The Leaning Tower of Pisa is known for its unintended tilt.
The Sphinx is a mythical creature with the body of a lion and the head of a human.
The Acropolis is an ancient citadel located on a rocky outcrop above Athens.
The Parthenon is a former temple on the Athenian Acropolis, Greece.
